short_summary: Three (3) staffing consultants are required to support staffing teams in the delivery of services to clients and to ensure business continuity of staffing operations.
description: Staffing consultants are required to deliver staffing services across a range of categories. The staffing consultants will work in a dynamic and innovative environment with experienced staff who will support the consultants in the administration processes. The selected candidate(s) are expected to work as an extension to Elections Canada clients, interacting and collaborating with internal and/or external stakeholders to ensure high quality services. Key responsibilities, as outlined below, include developing a recruitment plan and promotions strategy for the Results and Electoral Management Goods Branch  to support the 2019 General Election .  The contract period, which will be from the Effective Date of the Contract for one (1) year (the  Initial Term ), will also include irrevocable options to extend the period of the Contract by 2 additional periods of 12 months each,
